rows.label: bf02120140_0010
rows.name: Fie! Who has the courage to heed the Empire's call?

rows.label: bf02120140_0020
rows.name:
Your strong heart today
will build a strong Superbia tomorrow!

rows.label: bf02120140_0030
rows.name:
Of course, you get more than a salary!
Pension and benefits are included!

rows.label: bf02120140_0040
rows.name:
Distinguish yourself and you 
could even join the nobility!

rows.label: bf02120140_0050
rows.name:
For the glory of the Superbian Empire
and His Majesty Emperor Nefer!

rows.label: bf02120140_0060
rows.name: Come now! Who wants to be the hero of tomorrow?!

rows.label: bf02120140_0070
rows.name: Hmm... What's the deal over there?

rows.label: bf02120140_0100
rows.name:
Recently, they've been recruiting
Drivers from all over the place.

rows.label: bf02120140_0110
rows.name:
The pool of potentials is ever shrinking.
They must have run out of candidates in the military.

rows.label: bf02120140_0120
rows.name:
What do you mean by "potentials"?
I'm not sure I follow.
